title: Reese Witherspoon says 'crappy script' inspired her to become producer while promoting new show
text:
Reese Witherspoon revealed during a talk show visit Tuesday that a 'really crappy script' inspired her to become a producer.

The 43-year-old actress opened up on becoming a producer while promoting her new series The Morning Show on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon.

She was asked by host Jimmy, 45, what made her get into producing.

Hollywood producer: Reese Witherspoon revealed during a talk show visit Tuesday that a 'really crappy script' inspired her to become a producer

'You know, I read a really crappy script. And it got me so mad. I was like ''This is the worst script I've ever read in my entire life.'' It was like eight years ago. And I was like, 'I don't want to do it'',' Reese said.

'And I called my agent and said, ''I'm not doing this. This is terrible.'' It's like the girlfriend, she was dumb, and she had no point,' Reese continued.

'And my agent said to me, ''Every woman in town wants this part. And I thought, ''If this is the kind of stuff that's in Hollywood, like I have to start making my own stuff'',' Reese said.

The Oscar-winning actress started the production company Pacific Standard in 2012.

TV drama; The 43-year-old actress opened up on becoming a producer while promoting her new series The Morning Show on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon

She later founded the Hello Sunshine media company in 2016 and Pacific Standard is now a subsidiary.

Hello Sunshine is one of the production companies involved in Reese's new Apple TV+ series The Morning Show.

She is an executive producer of the drama along with co-star Jennifer Aniston, 50.

Game time: Reese also participated in a game of Can You Feel It? with Jimmy

Reese also is an executive producer of the HBO series Big Little Lies along with Nicole Kidman, 52, who also co-stars and co-produces with her.

Jimmy asked if there would be a third season of Big Little Lies and Reese said she didn't know.

'I mean, I guess it matters like if the audience wants it. Do you want it?' Reese asked as the audience roared.

Touch only: Jimmy and Reese took turns trying to identify items in a box only by touch

Cracking up: Reese cracked up as Jimmy freaked out about putting his hands in the box

'OK,' she said jokingly.

Reese also participated in a game of Can You Feel It? with Jimmy.

They had to take turns guessing items in a box only by touch including: melted candy, gourds, a fake spider, dentures and Yoda.
description: The 43-year-old actress revealed during a talk show visit Tuesday that a 'really crappy script' inspired her to become a producer.
